info.title: FitnessPR API
info.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking and personal record management API

post.description: Register a new user.
Authenticate user and return tokens.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

schema.title: Response Refresh Token Api V1 Auth Refresh Post

post.description: Change user password.

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users  Get
Response List Clients Api V1 Clients  Get

post.description: Create a client profile for a user.
Authenticate client using PIN code.

put.description: Update client profile via PIN access (limited fields).

get.description: Get client profile by ID (trainers and admins only).

put.description: Update client profile by ID (trainers and admins only).

post.description: Assign a trainer to a client (admins only).
Regenerate PIN code for a client (trainers and admins only).

get.description: Get all clients assigned to a trainer.

schema.title: Response Get Trainer Clients Api V1 Clients Trainer  Trainer Id  Clients Get

post.description: Create a trainer profile for a user.

get.description: Get all trainers (auth required for tests).

schema.title: Response Get All Trainers Api V1 Trainers  Get
Response Search Trainers Api V1 Trainers Search Get

post.description: Add a certification to current trainer.
Set trainer availability for a day.

get.description: Get trainer profile by ID (public endpoint).

put.description: Update trainer profile by ID (admin only).

get.description: Get trainer's clients by trainer ID.
Get trainer statistics by ID (admin only).

schema.title: Response Get Exercises Api V1 Exercises  Get

post.description: Create a new exercise (trainers and admins only).

get.description: Seed database with default exercises (admin only).
Search exercises by name or description.

schema.title: Response Search Exercises Api V1 Exercises Search Get
Response Get Popular Exercises Api V1 Exercises Popular Get

get.description: Get exercises targeting a specific muscle group.

schema.title: Response Get Exercises By Muscle Group Api V1 Exercises By Muscle  Muscle Group  Get

get.description: Get exercises that require specific equipment.

schema.title: Response Get Exercises By Equipment Api V1 Exercises By Equipment  Equipment  Get
Response Get Bodyweight Exercises Api V1 Exercises Bodyweight Get

put.description: Update an exercise (trainers and admins only).

delete.description: Delete an exercise (soft delete - trainers and admins only).

post.description: Create a new progress log entry.

get.description: Get progress logs for a client.

schema.title: Response Get Client Progress Logs Api V1 Progress Client  Client Id  Get

get.description: Get progress statistics for a client.

post.description: Create a new fitness program (trainers and admins only).

schema.title: Response Get Programs Api V1 Programs  Get
Response Get Popular Programs Api V1 Programs Popular Get

get.description: Search programs by name or description.

schema.title: Response Search Programs Api V1 Programs Search Get

get.description: Get programs created by a trainer.

schema.title: Response Get Trainer Programs Api V1 Programs Trainer  Trainer Id  Get

post.description: Add an exercise to a program.

get.description: Get all exercises in a program.

post.description: Create a new session booking.

get.description: Get session bookings with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Session Bookings Api V1 Sessions  Get

get.description: Get trainer's schedule for a date range.
Get available time slots for a trainer on a specific date.

schema.title: Response Get Client Sessions Api V1 Sessions Client  Client Id  Sessions Get

post.description: Cancel a session booking.
Confirm a pending session booking (trainers only).
Mark a session as completed (trainers only).
Create a new meal plan (trainers and admins only).

get.description: Get meal plans with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Meal Plans Api V1 Meals  Get

get.description: Search meal plans by name or description.

schema.title: Response Search Meal Plans Api V1 Meals Search Get

get.description: Get active meal plans for a client.

schema.title: Response Get Client Active Meal Plans Api V1 Meals Client  Client Id  Active Get

put.description: Update a meal plan (trainers and admins only).

delete.description: Delete a meal plan (soft delete - trainers and admins only).

post.description: Add a recipe to a meal plan (trainers and admins only).

get.description: Get all recipes in a meal plan.
Get meal plan for a specific day.
Get nutritional summary for a meal plan.
Generate a weekly meal plan structure.

post.description: Duplicate an existing meal plan (trainers and admins only).
Create a new notification template (admins only).

schema.title: Response Get Notification Templates Api V1 Notifications Templates Get

get.description: Get notification template by ID (admins only).

post.description: Send a notification.

schema.title: Response Get My Notifications Api V1 Notifications  Get
Response Get All Notifications Api V1 Notifications All Get

ClientProfileUpdate.title: ClientProfileUpdate
ClientProfileUpdate.description: Client profile update via PIN access.

day_number.title: Day Number
day_number.description: Day number in the meal plan

meal_order.title: Meal Order
meal_order.description: Order within the same meal type

role.title: Role
role.description: User role: client, trainer, or admin

client_id.title: Client Id
client_id.description: Client ID (if booking for specific client)

daily_plans.title: Daily Plans
daily_plans.description: Daily meal plans for the week
